name: @ptkdev/all-shields-cli
displayName: Badges generator from dotfiles for any markdown
description: Tool to help automate your badges of shields.io, badgen.net, fury.io, github action and snyk.io from .all-shieldsrc dotfile for your markdown files. You can use Liquid variables like {{name}} or {{version}} which refer to your package.json. Inspired by all-contributors-cli
author: Patryk Rzucid≈Ço [@ptkdev] <support@ptkdev.io> (https://ptk.dev)

scripts.dev: ts-node scripts/configs.ts && ts-node scripts/debug.ts --enable && ts-node scripts/rmdist.ts && nodemon --exec 'npm run build && npm run start'
scripts.release: ts-node scripts/configs.ts && ts-node scripts/debug.ts --disable && npm run build && ttsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.git-set-upstream: git remote add upstream git@github.com:ptkdev/all-shields-cli.git && git fetch upstream
scripts.git-pull-upstream: git pull upstream main && git pull upstream beta && git pull upstream nightly
scripts.git-ignore-reset: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m "[Fix] Removing all files in .gitignore"
scripts.npm-publish-beta: git checkout beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.npm-publish-nightly: git checkout nightly && npm publish --tag nightly
scripts.pre-commit: npm run contributors-generate && npm run all-shields-generate && npm run lint-fix && npm run test
scripts.pkg-clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && husky install
scripts.pkg-upgrade: npx npm-check-updates -u && npm install && husky install
